t: Psalm 136
His Steadfast Love Endures Forever
Give*pn thanks to the Lord,*s for he is good, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever.
Give*ln thanks to the God of gods, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever.
Give*ln thanks to the Lord of lords, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*pn him who alone does great wonders, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*ln him who by understanding made the heavens, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*ln him who spread out the earth above the waters, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*ln him who made the great lights, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
the*ln sun to rule over the day, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
the*ln moon and stars to rule over the night, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*pn him who struck down the firstborn of Egypt, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
and*ln brought Israel out from among them, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
with*ln a strong hand and an outstretched arm, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*ln him who divided the Red Sea in two, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
and*ln made Israel pass through the midst of it, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
but*ln overthrew Pharaoh and his host in the Red Sea, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*ln him who led his people through the wilderness, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
to*pn him who struck down great kings, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
and*ln killed mighty kings, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
Sihon,*ln king of the Amorites, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
and*ln Og, king of Bashan, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
and*ln gave their land as a heritage, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
a*ln heritage to Israel his servant, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever.
It*pn is he who remembered us in our low estate, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
and*ln rescued us from our foes, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever;
he*ln who gives food to all flesh, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever.
Give*pn thanks to the God of heaven, for*ld his steadfast love endures forever.
